cause.description:
Made By Survivors helps survivors and people at risk by providing sustainable income - we sell beautiful handicrafts made by survivors at 22 shelters and prevention programs all over the world.
We also offer you a way to become involved in fighting human trafficking, helping survivors, and educating others about this human rights crisis. Made By Survivors is helping to create a community of modern abolitionists in the US – everyday people who want to help end slavery.
see www.madebysurvivors.com for more info
1. Slavery must be eliminated
2. Individuals can make big impact with small actions
cause.mission: Fighting Human Trafficking and Slavery with Empowerment and Social Enterprise
cause.name: Made By Survivors
